official.headline: System Security Update
official.anchor_line: Officials confirm a minor equipment fault in a secure government facility has been efficiently addressed.
official.contextual_reframing: Routine system checks and technological vigilance ensure Stenograd’s continued safety and seamless daily life for all citizens.

underground.headline: Council Sabotage Signs?
underground.anchor_line: Glitched mirror in top government sector flashes hidden messages—now sudden leader demotions and BCI drops hit the news.
underground.contextual_reframing: They call it 'maintenance,' but leaked logs point to inside sabotage and Council infighting. The system’s cracks are showing—watch your score, and each other.
